@BebeHillz, as an asian living in asia, I can see where you're coming from, the fact that most people around here are daunted when faced with someone of those attributes does speak a lot about the closed-mindedness of the average person. For example, in my country talking about sex and racist views are seen as taboos that have no grounds for discussion. But, we know that racism is bad regardless and a conversation can always be had around sex.

Honestly what is up with cuck culture over in asia. Like psychologically it really intrigues me how at almost a cultural level being beta is considered... normal?? And it kinda goes both sides with girls and guys. Both parties are taught to be so extremelly passive and in all forms of their media being "aggressive" "forthcoming" or "frank" are all attributes of a villain. Its like the closest modern humanity could probably get to a hive mind.
It's kind of a shame though how the characters got wasted in a NTR hentai, both the MC and his girlfriend were prime GFD material but the author had to make him a cuck instead of just being a sub.

It's pretty unusual to see a netorare in where all the three characters are decently likeable. The girl was a kind girlfriend instead of a bitch, and the other guy was pretty cool actually, far from being the typical douchebag or ugly basstard, instead he was a good friend who cared about the MC and always respected both his and his girlfriend's decisions. Even the MC wasn't that bad, he is a cuck but he's not some spineless guy who has to accept having his girlfriend fuck another guy because he's too pathetic to do something about it; instead he's the one who wanted to see her having sex with his friend. Though, this isn't actually netorare, no one is getting stolen here, the three of them agreed to this so that would make it cuckold instead of netorare. The cheating tag is also wrong, because the MC agreed to her having sex with their friend and was even the first one to propose it.
